p: Because subtype 2 was the predominant subtype worldwide since the 1950s, its evolutionary rate was estimated based on three genes. We detected different evolutionary rates for different genes. Penton base (9.52 × 10 −5 substitutions/site/year; 95% HPD: 2.79 × 10 −5–1.71 × 10 −4) had a faster evolutionary rate than hexon (2.27 × 10 −5 substitutions/site/year; 95% HPD: 9.80 × 10 −6–3.66 × 10 −5) and fiber genes (7.58 × 10 −5 substitutions/site/year; 95% HPD: 3.34 × 10 −5–1.25 × 10 −4).
